mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by a lot of mods.

mod.name: Better Boat
mod.description: This mod fixes several issues with vanilla boats.

mod.name: Bookshelf
mod.description: Bookshelf is a core/library mod, which adds new features and tools into the game for other content creators to work with. The primary focus of this project is to make use of the combined strength of the modded community to create wonderful tools that everyone can use.

mod.name: IE Plants
mod.description: This mod replaces IE's plants with TFC crops.

mod.name: Leather Water Sac
mod.description: It's a water sac made out of leather for TerraFirmaCraft

mod.name: TerraFirmaCraft
mod.description: Survival Mode as it should have been.

mod.name: TerraFirmaPumpkins
mod.description: This mod adds growable pumpkin and melon plants to TerraFirmaCraft.

mod.name: terrafirmastuff
mod.description: A simple add-on that adds some cosmetic blocks for TFC.

mod.name: TerraMisc
mod.description: Random stuff and things for TerraFirmaCraft!

mod.name: TFC Wells
mod.description: This mod adds Wells to TerraFirmaCraft that can be used to produce Fresh Water.

mod.name: AutomatedBellowsAddon
mod.description: TFC bellows automatizer addon.

mod.name: TFC Cellars Addon
mod.description: TFC cellars and ice-houses addon

mod.name: TFC Crop Index
mod.description: This mod alters TFC's crops system to allow for easier extensibility

mod.name: TFC Scales
mod.description: Scales for precise food dividing in TerraFirmaCraft

mod.name: TFCTech
mod.description: A mod providing compatibility between TFC and tech mods.

mod.name: TFC Udary Mod
mod.description: Nickel extraction from iron ore, and more.

mod.name: Particle Accelerator
mod.description: Accelerate something to get UU matter!

mod.name: Advanced Machines
mod.description: Upgraded IC2 machines

mod.name: Advanced Lightsabers Mod
mod.description: Adds lightsabers'n'stuff.

mod.name: Advanced Rocketry
mod.description: A space mod for minecraft, adds planets, rockets, and some machines

mod.name: Antique Atlas
mod.description: Antique Atlas is a book that acts like a map featuring infinite scrolling, zoom and custom labeled markers. The map is generated around the player by calculating the average biome in each 16x16 chunk.

mod.name: Applied Energistics 2
mod.description: A Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world..

mod.name: Aroma1997Core
mod.description: This is basically a library used by most my other mods.

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.name: BetterFps
mod.description: Performance Improvements

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware, fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables, enchanted plates, map frames, and seats!

mod.name: BiblioWoodsTFC
mod.description: BiblioWoods TFC edition brings recipes and TFC specific items for BiblioCraft so both mods can be enjoyed together

mod.name: Buildcraft
mod.description: Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more!

mod.name: BuildCraft Compat
mod.description: Compatibility add-on for BuildCraft

mod.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mod.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: A mod that adds in many fancy blocks for decoration, which are crafted utilising the Chisel.

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Base common code for all chickenbones mods.

mod.name: CoFH Lib
mod.description: Library/API required by all CoFH mods. It's also meant as a resource for other modders!

mod.name: CreativeCore
mod.description: A simple core mod required by most of my mods.

mod.name: Meta Mod: Custom Items
mod.description: A simple way to add your custom stuff to minecraft.

mod.name: Custom Chest Loot
mod.description: Allows for complete chest loot customization.

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: Custom Ore Generation
mod.description: Allows the player to customize how ore is generated.

mod.name: Decocraft
mod.description: Adds 500+ models to decorate your Minecraft world.

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Library mod used by EnderIO, EnderZoo, and others

mod.name: EnhancedPortals

mod.name: Extra Utilities
mod.description: Just a bunch of useful things

mod.name: Factorization

mod.name: Advanced Generators
